subject: Hurricane Katrina
Stadiums and Arenas
Weather
lead_paragraph: When the roof ripped, water seeped in, lights flickered, and toilets quit, the Superdome workers helped hold the place together after Hurricane Katrina last August.
snippet: When the roof ripped, water seeped in, lights flickered, and toilets quit, the Superdome workers helped hold the place together after Hurricane Katrina last August.
